application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Red Oak - 3-4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points retaining shortened furnishing growth where possible for crown continuity. Remove selected lower limbs on the Northern canopy side over the road to lessen weight on that side due to the defect on the main trunk and sparser canopy on the Southern side & deadwood (Tree in Decline).
